dcterms:creator: J. Naganawa
K. Haneda
M. Kim
T. Aoyagi
J. Takada
dcterms:description: This dataset involves antenna de-embedding in FDTD-based radio propagation prediction using spherical wave functions, which helps reduce numerical effort in antenna simulations.
dcterms:title: Antenna de-embedding in FDTD-based radio propagation prediction using spherical wave functions

dcterms:creator: J. Naganawa
J. Takada
T. Aoyagi
M. Kim
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on antenna de-embedding in WBAN channel modeling using spherical wave functions, providing insights into wireless body area networks.
dcterms:title: Antenna de-embedding in WBAN channel modeling using spherical wave functions

dcterms:creator: G. Kristensson
dcterms:description: This dataset contains information on spherical vector waves, which are essential for understanding wave propagation in spherical coordinates.
dcterms:title: Spherical vector waves

dcterms:creator: X. G. Santiago
M. Hammerschmidt
S. Burger
C. Rockstuhl
I. Fernandez-Corbaton
L. Zschiedrich
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a method for decomposing scattered electromagnetic fields into vector spherical wave functions on surfaces with general shapes.
dcterms:title: Decomposition of scattered electromagnetic fields into vector spherical wave functions

dcterms:creator: L. Berkelmann
T. Martinelli
A. Friedrich
D. Manteuffel
dcterms:description: This dataset describes the design and integration of a wearable antenna system for on and off-body communication based on 3D-MID technology.
dcterms:title: Wearable antenna system for on and off-body communication
